replies.body: {{champion:41}} The guy who sings all the openings in Spongebob
mine is fuken mario and yoshi {{champion:240}}

> [{quoted}](name=Enderspider,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ai6dv4VQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-14T20:10:24.869+0000)

That is a moogle on a chocobo you uncultured swine
None of the above, my favorite is Goku {{champion:62}}

I'm not sure if you're saying that just as a Dragonball reference or also because Goku is the Japanese name for the god named Wukong in Chinese mythology...
I wanted to name him the flying spaghetti monster instead

Petition for her legendary skin to be a mermaid...Riot pls
YAsuo looks nothing like mugen, the fuck even.

That's not how you spell "Vivi", you silly goose.
https://i.imgur.com/tfbgcKB.png?noredirect
Yeah I got dragged in by the Disney equivalent xD
That's a really bizarre way of spelling Fabio.

Or Stefano Valentini.
Both work.

{{champion:202}} _"Ah yes. I remember Stefano. He was a student at my father's martial arts school. He came from Piltover, as his parents thought this would be better discipline for his actions back home. He was a bright student, yes, but his style was lacking. We shared some thing in common, our love of art for example, but I had no desire to be friends with him. He insisted, though, and soon we both found out each other's dark secrets. We both had been torturing and killing animals in the forest, twisting their bodies into wonderful works of art, for months. This soon became a 'friendly competition' between the two of us. He has always tried to take my spotlight, but he simply lacks the talent to outshine me. He also never evolved past blades, unlike myself. I haven't seen him for a very long time, but the next time I do see him.... It will be marvelous."_

> [{quoted}](name=Amxen,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ai6dv4VQ,comment-id=001f0000,timestamp=2018-01-15T02:50:17.684+0000)
>
> Or Stefano Valentini.
> Both work.

I haven't seen him for a very long time, but the next time I do see him.... It will be marvelous."_
